subject: p16826047
History: Pleural effusion, status post drainage of 600 cc through Pleurx.
Findings: A right Pleurx catheter remains in place with little change in appearance of large loculated right pleural effusion despite large amount of drainage with the majority of fluid loculated in the right major fissure. There is, otherwise, no short-term interval change compared to with mild cardiomegaly and known central adenopathy. There is no edema.
Impression: No significant change in right large loculated pleural effusion with mostly a major fissural component despite large amount of drainage through Pleurx. Otherwise, no significant interval change compared to .
